import React from "react"; import "./Basket.css"; import BasketOrderItem from "../Components/BasketOrderItem"; import axios from "axios"; import { baseUrl } from "../baseUrl/baseUrl"; import Loading from "../Components/Loading/Loading"; const Basket = () => { const [active, setActive] = React.useState(""); const [orders, setOrders] = React.useState([]); const [entityOrders, setEntityOrders] = React.useState({ userId: "", products: [], entity: { stir: "", entityName: "", phone: "", }, addressinfo: { city: "", street: "", }, }); const [userOrder, setUserOrder] = React.useState({ userId: "", products: [], phone: "", addressinfo: { city: "", street: "", }, }); //select option function document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () { var elems = document.querySelectorAll("select"); window.M.FormSelect.init(elems); }); const radioHandler = (e) => { setActive(e.target.value); }; React.useEffect(() => { const basket = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("salamBasket")); axios .post( baseUrl + "/products/cart", { products: basket }, { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, } ) .then((res) => { setOrders(res.data); }); }, []); return (
